title: CVS - 1063 S Pendleton St, Easley SC - Hours, Directions, Reviews - Loc8NearMe
text: CVS, a popular pharmacy chain, has received positive reviews from customers in the Easley, South Carolina area. The staff is described as very friendly and helpful, a rare quality these days. While the selection may not be the greatest, the store has most of the basic necessities. Customers have praised the pharmacy department, particularly Stephanie, for their exceptional service. Maria, a front-desk employee, has also been commended for her personable and friendly demeanor, making customers feel instantly welcomed. The store is praised for its cleanliness and competitive prices, especially for CVS's own brand products. Overall, the standout feature of this CVS location seems to be the exceptional customer service, which sets it apart in an industry where good service can be hard to find. Very friendly and helpful staff which is absolutely hard to find. Good not great selection, but most of your basic necessities can be found here. November 2022 I just switched to CVS from Prisma's upstate pharmacy and OMG! I wished I'd done it years ago! Managing my scripts is so much easier and convenient.....and the drive thru has been a lifesaver.... everyone is so nice at the Pendleton St store....
